quotes.quote: Smile and Slay. You have to slay it in life or life will slay you.
Man's greatest joy is to slay his enemy, plunder his riches, ride his steeds, see the tears of his loved ones and embrace his women
Stress is an important dragon to slay - or at least tame - in your life.
